title: Ticket #4682: win cmake script to copy the build results to to the release dir fails
description:
From the build instructions on making an installer BuildingHtcondorOnWindows

There is a cmake file that will copy the build products to the correct subdirectories of a HTCondor installation. This can be used to overwrite an existing HTCondor install, or to layout the HTCondor files in preparation for making the installer.

cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:PATH=c:\scratch\condor\release_dir -P cmake_install.cmake

Note: Building the INSTALL target in the Condor.sln solution file invokes this cmake file. It will copy build results to $(SolutionDir)\release_dir

This fails with

CMake Error at src/condor_procd/cmake_install.cmake:43 (FILE): file INSTALL cannot find "C:/condor/src/condor_procd/Release/condor_procd.pdb". Call Stack (most recent call first): src/cmake_install.cmake:50 (include) cmake_install.cmake:67 (include)
remarks: Added instruction to set BUILD_TYPE in instructions to cmake command/
creator: calderon
